description: Ensure links expose descriptive text for assistive technologies.
recommendation: Provide visible link text or aria-labels that describe the destination. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.4.4)
algorithm: Flags <a> elements (and link macros) whose accessible name is empty after checking text, aria-label/labelledby, title, or nested image alt.
algorithm_advanced: Checks <a> and freemarker link macros for accessible name via text, aria-label/labelledby, title, or nested image alt.
